short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: a tool to allow image files to be viewed on a google form response

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this tool to render images on your Google forms (like signatures) when you go to print them. When there is a File Upload field in the form, navigate to an Individual response. Click the extension icon and scan for images. If any are found, you'll see them and can print using the Print button.
